content: Great concept. Like other reviewers mention, it frequently fails to load data. My impression is there are limited servers to run/support this app. Would be great if somebody could give this a financial boost for hardware upgrades. A lot of potential here.

great when it works. but recently it reports "A winter storm is currently disrupting data flow to our satellite dishes. However, your local forecast should still be working." So the 3 hour local rain forecast is dead. Is this app just one guy running this in his basement?

Meh. This app is absolutely the most accurate rain forecaster that I can find. Correct to the minute, espec within the 3hr wheel. Long range pretty accurate too and I rely heavily on it. Problem is - usually when bad wx pends and I need it most - I get no forecast and note that says "Server Error. Please check again later". No prob on my end - all else works fine. Once that note stayed for a full day. Searching now for other apps maybe more reliable. Will always keep this also.
Good forecasts nice UI BUT!!! please fix server error!
8 p
Constantly "loading" used to be great but I can't use it if it keeps circling. Deleting now.
Great app. Especially if your a motorcycle rider

It used to work better .. I feel it's due for a major overhaul. .forecast is not working with current update. It rained today morning and the app still showed as dry where as Today weather rightly predicted rain.
Solid weather app. Make sure you contact the developer before ranting! They are making it better very quickly.
One request........ How about a couple of widgets.
Nice app but no notifications. Might be forgivable but no widget as well. No free or trial version. Have to pay from the get go.
Love it
a very different type of weather app, but I love it. so worth the money...
RainAware is an excellent amp never lets me I always know when the rain is coming

This app would be great if it had any kind of notifications for when you were not already in the app. Another good addition would be to have a widget so you could always see a summary of your conditions looking at the widget. Tapping either the notification or the widget would open the app so you could view the details if you needed them. Now, the app icon just sits there.
Best of its kind on the markt

**Stopped working**, android 4.3. Endless "loading" spinning circle for the "main" and "imagery" tabs, the only one that works at all is "forecast." Did all the uninstall/reinstall stuff, delete data etc, nope, still not working. Whenever I had an intermittent delay w/ main tab load issue, I would change the city and that would fix it. Bottom line is I have tried everything to get this program to work and nothing worthwhile works anymore. Too late for a refund, so here is the bad review.
Dang close
Very accurate in predicting rain I am happy with it

I love this app and have used it for years happily. The only reason I'm giving it 4 instead of 5 stars is that the interface could be prettier, some notification options would be nice, and it seems like it might not be actively worked on much anymore. But overall, it's great. One of the few apps I've used consistently for years.

I've been waiting and hoping for an update that would include a push notification for when precipitation is in the area. I mistakenly thought a widget and notifications were already part of this app when I purchased it, but they weren't. That's my fault for not exploring deeper.  There's other weather apps that have push notifications to inform the user of incoming weather, which I've been using them. I have contacted the Devs over the past couple years about implementing push notifications and widgets, and I was told those features would be added. Still nothing added. The last update didn't do anything noticeable. Without push notification, this app isn't much better than a generic weather app. Unfortunately, I think the Dev(s) have abandoned this app. I hope they prove me wrong though!
Rain prediction is GREAT, love it! But radar no workie. I hope they fix it

I've had it for a few years. The first time I used it, it was spot on in predicting heavy rain at 325 PM. It's rarely ever been accurate again, even in the 6-12 hour range. Don't waste your time and money.
Doesn't do radar. Just spins and spins like it's loading. It's time for an update, but they don't have one.
Does this app forecast snow?
I think you need to provide me with the app I paid for and didn't receive either (2) tomes ordered
Love
Could not give local weather
"Cannot get an accurate rain time: Sorry local radar is temporarily offline." This is what I've gotten since the third day after purchase. This app is as worthless as a football bat.
Updating review, lowering score.  Would like push notification options, as well as Android wear support. App had potential but has never been updated.

The app is great. 4 stars because that's what this app's average is, so it won't affect it adversely. Provide any kind of notification, such as push or even text, if when it is going to rain, and this app is 5 stars easily.
Rain clock not working. I've had light rain for the last hour and the clock reads dry
Add push notifications to it and then it's a 5 start app!
Everytime I check it, it pushes out the time when it says it's going to start raining.

I love this app. As a track official and golf tournament director, I rely on this app for all weather activities.  It has been very accurate. Plus when I had problems, the support staff was extremely helpful.
From the day I bought the application  I still waiting  on this to be loading I have very good WiFi  signal, been trying for more then week. Wasted  my money.
It would be alot better with a notification wen the rain was gonna start

It has been raining most of the evening, unfortunately this app says it has not rained. Have turned off the clutter filter and lowered the threshold, no difference. If you like to waste money this is for you.
replyContent: Was it drizzle or light rain? Also, do you live next mountains where there may be radar beam blockage? Contact us and we will help you out.

content: Ad doesn't even come close. Don't waste your money. Last sat pouring rain app said dry.
replyContent: Tim, simply go into your settings and turn off the clutter filtering.  This will solve the "missing rain" issue. You might also consider lowering your precipitation intensity threshold, but just try turning off clutter filter first.

content: Best weather app available but loads slow of it loads at all. Very unstable and undependabe.
replyContent: We sent out an update today, should behave better.

content: I heard about this app on MLB during a baseball game. In Pittsburgh where there's a lot of rain it was said the tarp crew use this app exclusively. If it's good enough for them it's good enough for me! I especially like the rain focus - as I ride a motorcycle and this is precisely the info I needed, I have no interest in being a meteorologist... Just want to know if it'll rain or not. Thanks!
I love the concept of this app and I think it works well, but It needs to load faster, in fact it won't even load on my Galaxy S6 right now as we speak.   Please fix
replyContent: Sorry marc, we would like to get the issue fixed for you. Please email contact_us@rainaware.com for assistance.

content: The app works well now after I made that adjustment.. Thank you!
replyContent: Billie, please go into settings and lower your precipitation detection threshold.  This will fix your issue.

content: When u open would.ve nice I'd it would automatically  zoom in to subscriber location  oth her than that cool
Very Accurate, within 20 min!
Forecast area needs something done though it's a little bland. Almost like it was thrown together quickly.
replyContent: Thank you for your rating. We plan on dressing it up a little with some weather icons and such.

content: Never seen an app like this. Love it! Crazy accurate.
This app was worth paying for. It sounds like it will continue improving. Thanks!!
Good app. Didn't work on my Samsung 6 when I first downloaded. Got quick response from RainAware with trouble shooting. Redownloaded works great now!
replyContent: Please update your app to latest version and try again. The bug should be fixed, please let us know thanks!

content: Not loading right
replyContent: Please try again, there was a minor server issue about that time...

content: Will not install on samsung s3. I see no option to get it refunded
replyContent: Edward, have you tried updating to the latest version, does it work now?

content: It's pouring out yet the app tells me it will start raining 20 minutes from now.... checked back about 30 mins later and it says it's dry.... while there is a downpour....glad I was able to get a refund
replyContent: You need to make sure settings are lower to detect light rain. I see it's pouring right now at 8:30 pm and I'm sure RainAware is doing just fine.

content: Hits it most of the time. About as perfect as you can expect. Love the satellite it's more up to date than anything else on the Internet.

While this app is extremely accurate it would be extremely nice to have a section added to alert when rain was incoming without having to open the app to look. Like a pop up or something similar would be great.
replyContent: The Alert feature will be added in version 2.0 later this year!

content: Super Accurate!

You check the app to see if it's going to rain. There should be some way of setting up notifications especially since all other free weather apps show pretty much the same data. Interface seems outdated.
replyContent: This feature will be added in version 2.0 later this year!

content: The app should notify you when rain is approaching without having to open it.
replyContent: This feature will be added in version 2.0 later this year!

content: Its awesome but on my old iPhone 4 it just stopped working. Since I have the Galaxy 4 now hopefully I won't have that same problem again. Other than that, it's very useful
Works great on galaxy tab pro.
Pretty much nailed the last rain event.  Impressed!
This is a great apps. It really works.
Has proven very accurate and useful.
